titleInfo.title: Letter, J.G.M. Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn., to J.G. McKnitt Ramsey. 1882 Jan. 12

mods.abstract: 1882 Jan. 12 J.G.M. Ramsey, Knoxville, Tenn. Feels that his physical and mental powers are rapidly failing. Turns over the execution of all his duties to his son, J.G. McKnitt Ramsey.

name.namePart: Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884
